entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
